scripts.deploy:rinkeby: cp ./mappings/utils/addresses-rinkeby.ts ./mappings/utils/addresses.ts && graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ 0xjurassicpunk/looks-distribution subgraph-rinkeby.yaml
scripts.deploy:mainnet: cp ./mappings/utils/addresses-mainnet.ts ./mappings/utils/addresses.ts && graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ looksrare/looks-distribution subgraph.yaml
